mapper.sql: ID, SEND_MOBILE, SEND_CONTENT, RESULT_STATE, CREATE_TIME, SEND_TYPE
mapper.select:
select
from log_sms_message where 1=1
and SEND_MOBILE LIKE concat('%', #{sendMobile},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into log_sms_message (ID, SEND_MOBILE, SEND_CONTENT, RESULT_STATE, RESULT_MSG, CREATE_TIME, SEND_TYPE) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sendMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resultMsg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sendType,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into log_sms_message
ID,
SEND_MOBILE,
SEND_CONTENT,
RESULT_STATE,
RESULT_MSG,
CREATE_TIME,
SEND_TYPE,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{sendMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sendContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resultState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{resultMsg,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{sendType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update log_sms_message
SEND_MOBILE = #{sendMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_CONTENT = #{sendContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESULT_STATE = #{resultState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RESULT_MSG = #{resultMsg,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SEND_TYPE = #{sendType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update log_sms_message set SEND_MOBILE = #{sendMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_CONTENT = #{sendContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESULT_STATE = #{resultState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RESULT_MSG = #{resultMsg,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SEND_TYPE = #{sendType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
